item.title: The Roguelike Tutorial - Week 5a
item.description: Another very productive week for this project! Although I was unable to finish last weeks goals of getting Parts 8 and 9 completed by today, I still feel pretty darn good about what I did accomplish. Besides, Parts 10, 11, and 12 are all fairly simple - heck the code is already in place, just needs to actually be used! After finishing Part 7 last week I decided to try and fix/change a few things that have been bothering me.
